name: WordPress Admin and Customer Messages After Order for WooCommerce: OrderConvo plugin缺失授权漏洞
product: ["WordPress Admin and Customer Messages After Order for WooCommerce: OrderConvo plugin <=14"]
description: WordPress和WordPress plugin都是WordPress基金会的产品。WordPress plugin是一个应用插件。WordPress Admin and Customer Messages After Order for WooCommerce: OrderConvo plugin存在缺失授权漏洞，该漏洞源于权限检查缺陷，目前没有详细的漏洞细节提供。
solution:
目前厂商尚未发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://wordpress.org/
